verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H259>month,<s%> in the first day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and to his <S%H1995>multitude:<s%> Whom are you <S%H1819>like<s%> in your <S%H1433>greatness?<s%>

<S%H804>Behold,<s%> the Assyrian was a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> with <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and with a <S%H6751>forest-like<s%> <S%H2793>shade,<s%> and of <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H6967>stature;<s%> and its <S%H6788>top<s%> was among the thick <S%H5688>boughs.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1431>nourished<s%> <S%H8415>it,<s%> the deep made it to <S%H7311>grow:<s%> its <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>ran<s%> all <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H4302>plantation;<s%> and it sent <S%H7971>out<s%> its <S%H8585>channels<s%> to all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Therefore its <S%H6967>stature<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> above all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and its <S%H5634>boughs<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and its <S%H6288>branches<s%> became <S%H748>long<s%> by reason of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> when it shot them <S%H7971>forth.<s%>

All the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> made their <S%H7077>nests<s%> in its <S%H5589>boughs;<s%> and under its <S%H6288>branches<s%> all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> brought forth their <S%H3205>young;<s%> and all <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> under its <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>
Thus was it <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> in its <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches;<s%> for its <S%H8328>root<s%> was by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

The <S%H730>cedars<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> could not <S%H6004>hide<s%> <S%H1265>it;<s%> the fir trees were not <S%H1819>like<s%> its <S%H5589>boughs,<s%> and the plane <S%H6196>trees<s%> were not as its <S%H6288>branches;<s%> nor was any <S%H6086>tree<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1819>like<s%> it in its <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

I <S%H6213>made<s%> it <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches,<s%> so that all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> that were in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> envied <S%H7065>it.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because you are <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in <S%H6967>stature,<s%> and he has <S%H5414>set<s%> his <S%H6788>top<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs,<s%> and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> in his <S%H1363>height;<s%>

I will even <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the mighty <S%H410>one<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> he shall <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H1644>him;<s%> I have driven him out for his <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%>

<S%H2114>Strangers,<s%> the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> have cut him <S%H3772>off,<s%> and have <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H2022>him:<s%> on the mountains and in all the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> his <S%H1808>branches<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> and his <S%H6288>boughs<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%> by all the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> from his <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> and have left <S%H5203>him.<s%>
On his <S%H4658>ruin<s%> all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell,<s%> and all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be on his <S%H6288>branches;<s%>

to the end that none of all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> themselves in their <S%H6967>stature,<s%> neither <S%H5414>set<s%> their <S%H6788>top<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs,<s%> nor that their mighty <S%H352>ones<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%> on their <S%H1363>height,<s%> even all who <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%> for they are all <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> to the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> with those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> I caused a <S%H56>mourning:<s%> I <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> for <S%H4513>him,<s%> and I restrained its <S%H5104>rivers;<s%> and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H3607>stayed;<s%> and I caused <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H6937>mourn<s%> for <S%H6086>him,<s%> and all the trees of the <S%H7704>field<s%> fainted for <S%H5969>him.<s%>

I made the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H4658>fall,<s%> when I cast him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with those who <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> and <S%H2896>best<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> all that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> were <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They also went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with him to those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> <S%H2220>yes,<s%> those who were his arm, that <S%H3427>lived<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

To whom are you thus <S%H1819>like<s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%> and in <S%H1433>greatness<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden?<s%> yet you will be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> with those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> This is <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
